Note:
This is the 'Extended' English version of this film. For anyone not already familiar with it, it was shot with an
international cast and each spoke in their own native tongue, all of which was dubbed in later as was customary
for Sergio Leone's and other Italian/European films of that era. Thus this film has no original language, and no
matter which language version of the film you watch there will always be noticeable audio sync issues. It's
supposed to be that way.

In 2002, the film was restored with the 18 minutes of scenes cut for U.S. release edited back into the film.
Clint Eastwood and Eli Wallach were brought back in to dub their characters' lines more than 35 years after
the film's original release.
